Package org.cid15.aem.veneer.api

Interface Linkable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    VeneeredPage, VeneeredResource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractComponent
    public interface Linkable
    Definition for "linkable" items, such as pages and components (i.e. path-addressable resources).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String getHref()
      Get the URL for this item.
      Link getLink()
      Get a link for this item.
      LinkBuilder getLinkBuilder()
      Get a link builder for the current resource path.
      String getName()
      Get the page or resource name.
      String getPath()
      Get the page or resource path.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Get the page or resource name.
        Returns:

      • getPath

        String getPath()
        Get the page or resource path.
        Returns:
        JCR path

        String getHref()

        Returns:

      • getLinkBuilder

        LinkBuilder getLinkBuilder()
        Get a link builder for the current resource path.
        Returns:
        builder instance for this item
